description:
Traverse the depths of the Tomb of Forbidden Knowledge; a sentient labyrinth
containing traces of the past in the form of glyphs. Formidable bosses, platforming,
and puzzles stand in the way of discovery - GLYPHS fulfills the extent that one
willingly searches for true knowledge. Your determination dictates where this story will unfold.

v0.2.0.description:
# Changes
- Implemented all remaining locations for the main map
- Implemented win conditions
- Fixed logic issues that made impossible seeds generate
- Implemented hat room
- Moved unobtainable items to reachable locations #3 
- Improved client - server interactions to be more stable #1

### YAML option implementation status
```
  Goal: Y
  StartingSword: N
  GenericParries: N
  Multiplayer: N
  RandomShopPrices: N
  EnableTraps: N
  UnreasonableLocations: N
  ShuffleHats: Y
  SwordlessCombat: Y
  BulletCombat: Y
  DashPuzzlesSolved: Y
  LogicalWallJumps: Y
  WizardRequirements: Y
  WraithRequirements: N (must be set to vanilla to ensure seeds generate correctly)
  WraithSilverCount: N
  WraithGoldCount: N
  WraithSmileCount: N
  WraithRuneCount: N
  WraithGlyphstoneCount: N
```

### Note:
Playing while disconnected from the server is untested and likely will break things. The Archipelago logo in the bottom right corner of your screen will light up with colors when you are connected and go dark blue when you are disconnected.
v0.2.0.title: Beta v0.2.0

v0.2.1.description:
# Hotfix
- Implemented all options related to the wraith fight
- fixed a bug where half of the hats in the hat room would not appear
- fixed a bug where the player would always spawn at worldspawn instead of their last save point
- optimized code
- removed the option to shuffle unreasonable locations as it only affects one location and nobody wants to leave glyphs open for 10 hours for one check

### YAML option implementation status
```
  Goal: Y
  StartingSword: N
  GenericParries: N
  Multiplayer: N
  RandomShopPrices: N
  EnableTraps: N
  ShuffleHats: Y
  SwordlessCombat: Y
  BulletCombat: Y
  DashPuzzlesSolved: Y
  LogicalWallJumps: Y
  WizardRequirements: Y
  WraithRequirements: Y
  WraithSilverCount: Y
  WraithGoldCount: Y
  WraithSmileCount: Y
  WraithRuneCount: Y
  WraithGlyphstoneCount: Y
```

### Note:
Playing while disconnected from the server is untested and likely will break things. The Archipelago logo in the bottom right corner of your screen will light up with colors when you are connected and go dark blue when you are disconnected.
v0.2.1.title: Beta v0.2.1

v1.0.0.description:
# Changes
- Implemented all remaining locations
- Fixed a few logic issues
- Implemented new hat shuffle option
- Optimized code
- Implemented shop price rando
- Implemented all remaining YAML options (excluding multiplayer and traps which are still coming soon)

### Note:
Playing while disconnected from the server is untested and likely will break things. The Archipelago logo in the bottom right corner of your screen will light up with colors when you are connected and go dark blue when you are disconnected.
v1.0.0.title: v1.0.0

v1.0.1.description:
# Hotfix
- Fixed a bug with the way sprites are rendered

### Note:
Playing while disconnected from the server is untested and likely will break things. The Archipelago logo in the bottom right corner of your screen will light up with colors when you are connected and go dark blue when you are disconnected.
v1.0.1.title: v1.0.1

v1.0.2.description:
## Mod Changes
- Actually fixed a bug with the way sprites are rendered
- Added a basic notification system so that items sent/received are displayed on screen instead of having to rely on the text client
- Fixed an issue where smilemask's reaction text would stack on top of it's self
- Adjusted how the save system works to prevent softlocks
- Fixed an issue where an item would spawn before it's puzzle had been completed
- Opened the door after the shadow chase which previously could not be opened
- Further optimized sprite rendering
- Changed default port number in `ConnectionConfig.json` for clarity

## Apworld Changes
- Fixed a bug that caused additional hats to be shuffled into the item pool

### Note:
Playing while disconnected from the server is untested and likely will break things. The Archipelago logo in the bottom right corner of your screen will light up with colors when you are connected and go dark blue when you are disconnected.
